text: [Music]
hello
i'm ravi an aws engineer here at aws
office in northern virginia today i'm
going to show you how customers can
share sensitive data in aws managed
accounts using aws secrets manager to
demonstrate this i will create a secret
key and a value with the required
namespace in aws managed accounts
let's get started
first let's login to aws management
console
then let's navigate to aws secret
manager console
and choose store a new secret
here i'll choose other type of secret
we enter the secret key and the value
let's use the default kms encryption and
choose next
let's enter the secret name and the
description the name should always start
with customer hyphen shared forward
slash
for example customer iphone shared
forward slash license hyphen 2018
and choose next
so let's leave automatic rotation as
disabled
and choose next
let's review and choose store to save
the secret
now customer will respond to aws manage
services team with a secret name so that
aims can identify and retrieve the
secret these same steps will be
performed by an ams engineer when ams
operations want to share the sensitive
data with the customer however the
namespace will be
ams
hyphen shared forward slash
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at aws
[Music]
